name: Instant Pot® Brown Rice
author: LauraF
summary: I haven't cooked rice on the stove since buying my electric pressure cooker! It's so easy and you can vary it up however you like; add spices or seasonings before cooking or fold in nuts and dried fruit after cooking.
directions: Combine water, brown rice, oil, and salt in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select Manual; set timer for 25 minutes on high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes
Fluff rice with a fork or a rice paddle
